casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ronald Guy WHITESIDE. No. 213P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. William H. Borden, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of May 2008 by Defendant for Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
